description: Sleepy Hollow features a picnic pavilion, washroom facilities, and picnic tables. It is a great spot for family gatherings and outdoor meals.
This picnic area is connected to the park's bike and walking trail network and offers easy access to a secluded beach.
Photo is "Prothonotary Warbler" by Deenaerrampalli via Wikimedia Commons, licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0.
Postcard image via Internet Archive. In the public domain.
